tutorials.title: Workshop Introduction
tutorials.description: This workshop will walk you through application lifecycle management with embedded code review using SonarQube. It will showcase how SonarQube can save time and improve code quality directly inside the agile development process.

tutorials.title: Lab 0: Setup Cloud Environment
tutorials.description: Setup trial account and provision Visual Builder Studio. Create compartment, VCN and instance in OCI.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Configure Visual Builder Studio
tutorials.description: Create project in Visual Builder Studio, clone project from Git repo and configure project to run build jobs.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Configure SonarQube Server
tutorials.description: Deploying SonarQube server in Compute Instance, connecting it to Visual Builder Studio and then running analysis on the project to check for potential issues and bug.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Fix Issues in the Code
tutorials.description: Look for issues identified in SonarQube, create a issue in Visual Builder Studio and resolve issue using built in git.

tutorials.title: Lab 4:  Deploy Microservice to Cloud
tutorials.description: Deploy the fixed code as a webservice inside a Docker container to cloud.
